descriptions:
Product Listing:

Introducing the oannao Silicone Cooking Utensils Kitchen Utensil Set! This high-quality kitchen utensil set is perfect for all your cooking needs. Made from food grade silicone, these utensils are BPA-free and safe to use. 

With a heat resistance of up to 446 degrees, you can confidently use these utensils for all your cooking and baking needs. The wooden handles provide a comfortable grip and prevent heat transfer, ensuring your safety while cooking.

The set includes a variety of essential utensils, such as a deep soup ladle, solid serving spoon, slotted spoon, slotted turner, turner, food tongs, pasta server, flexible spatula, basting brush, whisk, round spatula turner, large skimmer spoon, small silicone spatula, and an utensil holder to keep your kitchen organized.

These utensils feature a one-piece design with a stainless steel core, ensuring durability and longevity. The no gaps molding design prevents food from getting trapped, making them easy to clean. However, please note that these utensils are not dishwasher safe.

This utensil set is suitable for use with nonstick cookware, and the silicone material is non-reactive with food, preserving the flavors of your dishes. 

The oannao Silicone Cooking Utensils Kitchen Utensil Set comes with after-sales support, with a response time of within 12 hours. Additionally, the initial use instructions recommend soaking the utensils for half an hour and airing them for about 3 hours to remove any original smell of silica gel.
